references: J. M. Borwein, D. H. Bailey and R. Girgensohn, Experimentation in Mathematics, A K Peters, Ltd., Natick, MA, 2004. x+357 pp. See p. 11.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,20000
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac(tanh(Pi)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b060402.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 04 2009
author: _Bill Gosper_, Apr 04 2001
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Apr 06 2001
